block.p: RUBIN-Adena (Lipschitz). On September 24th, 2000 at age 96. Beloved wife of the late Dr. Eli H. Rubin. Loving mother of Zick, Leonard, and Susan Gesner Danziger. Devoted grandmother of Larry, Matthew, Mark, Elihu, and Noam, and great-grandmother of Meg and Burt. Dear sister of Sarah Novogrodsky, Maish Lippman, and the late Sadie Zide, Leah Rubin, Deb Slater, and Ralph Lippman. Caring aunt and great-aunt. Outstanding teacher and Hadassah leader. Burial was on Monday. Contributions may be made to the Solomon Schechter Day School of Greater Boston, 125 Wells Ave., Newton, MA 02459.
